title: classic serif and sans serif help!
content:
Hello can anyone help me out and figure these lovely fonts for me? Thank you!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [image.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724125718/http:/typophile.com/files/image_108.jpg) | 111.04 KB |

author: Primehunter

comments.content:
first sample: [Fontleroy NF](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724125718/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/cheapprofonts/fontleroy-nf-pro) by Nick Curtis and Roger S. Nelsson  
second sample: original should be [Bernhard Fashion](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724125718/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/bernhard+fashion) by Lucian Bernhard
